sentences.en: Bending or winding alternately from side to side sinuous.
sentences.cn: 蜿蜒的;曲折的从一边到另一边交替弯曲或蜿蜒的;曲折的.

sentences.en: He has a distinctively sinuous way of walking.
sentences.cn: 他走路扭来扭去，很有特点。

sentences.en: His sinuous and elastic line took part of its character from Art Nouveau calligraphy.
sentences.cn: 他的有力、有弹性的线条部分特色是来自于新艺术的书法艺术.

sentences.en: I drove along sinuous mountain roads.
sentences.cn: 我行驶在蜿蜒的山路上。

sentences.en: In the sinuous folds of the old capitals.
sentences.cn: 在古老首都那错综复杂的褶皱里.

sentences.en: Marked by or moving in a wavelike form or motion; sinuous.
sentences.cn: 波状的或以波浪式运动的; 起伏不平的.

sentences.en: Rising and falling in sinuous curves, epitomize the beauty and solitude of the Southwest's unspoiled lands.
sentences.cn: 在蜿蜒的曲线中起伏不定, 沙岩结构成为了西南部这片未损坏的陆地美丽与孤寂的缩影.

sentences.en: Roll deposits may be more than a mile in length along sinuous solution fronts.
sentences.cn: 卷型矿床的长度沿着弯曲的溶液前缘可达1哩以上.

sentences.en: Self - formed river channels tend to be sinuous.
sentences.cn: 自动形成的河槽是趋向于弯曲的.

sentences.en: The river wound its sinuous way across the plain.
sentences.cn: 这条河蜿蜒曲折地流过平原.

sentences.en: the sinuous grace of a cat
They followed the sinuous trail deep into the mountains.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着弯弯曲曲的小径进入深山。

sentences.en: We moved along the sinuous gravel walks , with the great concourse of girls and young men.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着曲折的石径,随着青年男女汇成的巨流一路走去.

sentences.en: Winding his sinuous way in the dark to the depths of the forest.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中迂回蜿蜒滑向树林的深处.

words.tran_cn: 蜿蜒地，弯曲地；拐弯抹角地；错综复杂地
弯曲；弯曲处；错综复杂；曲折度

trans.tran_en: moving with smooth twists and turns, like a snake
